mapper.insert: insert into QUESTIONBOARD(qno, qwriter, qtitle, qcontent) values(QUESTIONBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{qwriter}, #{qtitle}, #{qcontent})
mapper.select: select count(*) as total from questionboard where qtitle like '%'||#{qsearchName}||'%' qcontent like '%'||#{qsearchName}||'%' qwriter like '%'||#{qsearchName}||'%' 1=1
mapper.update: update questionboard set qtitle=#{qtitle}, qcontent=#{qcontent}, qregdate=sysdate where qno=#{qno}
update questionboard set qcnt = qcnt + 1 where qno = #{qno}
